newsitem.title: USA: Oceaneering to buy back up to 3.0 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Oceaneering to buy back up to 3.0 mln shrs.

text.p: Oceaneering International Inc said on Thursday that its Board of Directors has authorized the company to purchase up to three million shares of its common stock in the open market.
Oceaneering has approximately 23.9 million common shares outstanding, the company said.
Oceaneering said it took the action because it believes the recent market prices of the shares have been substantially less than their underlying value.
Timing and amounts of purchases will be governed by applicable SEC rules and market conditions, the company said.
Oceaneering said shares will be held in the company's treasury for future use.
